tool_description: API where developers can access the latest Blockchain Dev Codes
title: Boiler Plate Wiki

api_list.name: BoilerPlate for Blockchain Developers
api_list.description: Where developers can get latest dev codes for blockchain
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com/instructions/{blockchainid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest Blockchain Dev Codes
api_list.description: This end point will return dev codes for Solana, Algorand, and ethereum
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com/instructsions"

headers = {
